featured.text: What does “a crucial time” in the last paragraph refer to? (A) When the vessel hits a flat.
But the captain of a ship is responsible for guiding the vessel until they hit a port, waiting to enter the harbor.
Surprised by the father and son’s “pale faces” and their battered vessel, the Penghu police and fishers in Paisha rescued them.
The same strategy for docking a vessel during an incoming tide may not work during an outgoing tide.
A marine pilot goes on board at a crucial time and controls the vessel based on his or her knowledge of the port and the situation at hand.

definition.zh_def: 容器，特別是用於運輸液體或其他物質的器具。
definition.en_def: A container, especially one used for transporting liquids or other substances.
definition.example: The ship was a large vessel that carried goods across the ocean.
